long_description: Made of all-natural, durable cork, the Hugger Mugger cork yoga block will help you get the most out of your yoga routine. Cork is a renewable resource that is made from the bark of fast-growing cork oak trees. Natural texture of the cork provides traction; rounded edges make the block comfortable when used for supporting poses. Heavy weight provides excellent support and stability.
short_description: Made of all-natural, durable cork, the Hugger Mugger cork yoga block will help you get the most out of your yoga routine.
